010package imagingbook.common.histogram;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014

018public class Util {
019
020//      static int[] makeGaussianHistogram () {
021//              return makeGaussianHistogram(128, 50);
022//      }
023
024        public static int[] makeGaussianHistogram (double mean, double sigma) {
025                int[] h = new int[256];
026                double sigma2 = 2 * sqr(sigma);
027                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
028                        double x = mean - i;
029                        double g = Math.exp(-sqr(x) / sigma2) / sigma;
030                        h[i] = (int) Math.round(10000 * g);
031                }
032                return h;
033        }
034
035        public static double[] normalizeHistogram (double[] h) {
036                // find max histogram entry
037                double max = h[0];
038                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
039                        if (h[i] > max)
040                                max = h[i];
041                }
042                if (max == 0) return null;
043                // normalize
044                double[] hn = new double[h.length];
045                double s = 1.0/max;
046                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
047                        hn[i] = s * h[i];
048                }
049                return hn;
050        }
051        
052        // returns the cumulative histogram 
053        public static int[] cumulate(int[] h) {
054                final int K = h.length;
055                int[] C = new int[K];
056                C[0] = h[0];
057                for (int i = 1; i < K; i++) {
058                C[i] = C[i-1] + h[i];
059            }
060            return C;
061        }
062
063        //------------------------------------------------------
064        
065        public static double[] normalizeHistogram (int[] h) {
066                // find the max histogram entry
067                int max = h[0];
068                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
069                        if (h[i] > max)
070                                max = h[i];
071                }
072                if (max == 0) return null;
073                // normalize
074                double[] hn = new double[h.length];
075                double s = 1.0/max;
076                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
077                        hn[i] = s * h[i];
078                }
079                return hn;
080        }
081
082        public static double[] Cdf (int[] h) {
083                // returns the cumul. probability distribution function (cdf) for histogram h
084                int K = h.length;
085                int n = count(h);               // sum all histogram values             
086                double[] P = new double[K];
087                long c = h[0];
088                P[0] = (double) c / n;
089                for (int i = 1; i < K; i++) {
090                c = c + h[i];
091                P[i] = (double) c / n;
092            }
093            return P;
094        }
095
096        public static double[] Pdf (int[] h) {
097                // returns the probability distribution function (pdf) for histogram h
098                int K = h.length;
099                int n = 0;                      // sum all histogram values     
100                for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
101                        n = n + h[i]; 
102                }
103                double[] p = new double[K];
104                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
105                        p[i] =  (double) h[i] / n;
106                }
107                return p;
108        }
109
110        // methods moved from Thresholder -------------------------------
111        
112        // compute the sum of a histogram array
113//      @Deprecated
114//      public static int sum(int[] h) {
115//              int cnt = 0;
116//              for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
117//                      cnt += h[i];
118//              }
119//              return cnt;
120//      }
121
122        // compute the population of a histogram
123        public static int count(int[] h) {
124                return count(h, 0, h.length - 1);
125        }
126
127        // compute the population of a histogram from index lo...hi
128        public static int count(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
129                if (lo < 0) lo = 0;
130                if (hi >= h.length) hi = h.length-1;
131                int cnt = 0;
132                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
133                        cnt += h[i];
134                }
135                return cnt;
136        }
137
138        public static double mean(int[] h) {
139                return mean(h, 0, h.length - 1);
140        }
141
142        public static double mean(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
143                if (lo < 0)
144                        lo = 0;
145                if (hi >= h.length)
146                        hi = h.length - 1;
147                long cnt = 0;
148                long sum = 0;
149                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
150                        cnt = cnt + h[i];
151                        sum = sum + i * h[i];
152                }
153                if (cnt > 0)
154                        return ((double) sum) / cnt;
155                else
156                        return 0;
157        }
158
159        public static double sigma2(int[] h) {
160                return sigma2(h, 0, h.length-1);
161        }
162
163        // fast version
164        public static double sigma2(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
165                if (lo < 0)
166                        lo = 0;
167                if (hi >= h.length)
168                        hi = h.length - 1;
169                long A = 0;
170                long B = 0;
171                long N = 0;
172                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
173                        int ni = h[i];
174                        A = A + i * ni;
175                        B = B + i * i * ni;
176                        N = N + ni;
177                }
178                if (N > 0)
179                        return ((double) B - (double) A * A / N) / N;
180                else
181                        return 0;
182        }
183        
184        // this is a slow version, only for testing:
185//      protected double sigma2(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
186//              if (lo < 0) lo = 0;
187//              if (hi >= h.length) hi = h.length-1;
188//              double mu = mean(h,lo,hi);
189//              long cnt = 0;
190//              double sum = 0;
191//              for (int i=lo; i<=hi; i++) {
192//                      cnt = cnt + h[i];
193//                      sum = sum + (i - mu) * (i - mu) * h[i];
194//              }
195//              if (cnt > 0)
196//                      return ((double)sum) / cnt;
197//              else 
198//                      return 0;
199//      }
200
201
202        // compute the median of a histogram 
203        public static int median(int[] h) {
204                int K = h.length;
205                int N = count(h);
206                int m = N / 2;
207                int i = 0;
208                int sum = h[0];
209                while (sum <= m && i < K) {
210                        i++;
211                        sum += h[i];
212                }
213                return i;
214        }
215
216        public static double[] normalize(int[] h) {
217                int K = h.length;
218                int N = count(h);
219                double[] nh = new double[K];
220                for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
221                        nh[i] = ((double) h[i]) / N;
222                }
223                return nh;
224        }
225
226        public static double[] normalize(double[] h) {
227                double[] nh = new double[h.length];
228                double hmax = max(h);
229                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
230                        nh[i] = (double) h[i] / hmax;
231                }
232                return nh;
233        }
234
235        public static double max(double[] h) {
236                double hmax = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
237                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
238                        double n = h[i];
239                        if (n > hmax)
240                                hmax = n;
241                }
242                return hmax;
243        }
244
245}
